data.name: Plunderers Adventures: Sea of Whores
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1168850/Trix_and_the_Horny_Tower/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1292490/Inside_Her_bedroom/


About the Game

This game simulates a micro tower defense in which you have to protect Annie's and Riley's pirate ship. By moving around four lanes while shooting skills, your goal is to beat the opponents before they reach the girls behind the protagonists.

Features



  • Play with 2 powerful girls (a shooter and a buccaneer);
  • Defeat different enemy types;
  • Experience dynamic combat (different types of skills);
  • Get pieces of a narrative and access the whole story through a gallery;
  • Create unique strategies by understating the status system (slow, stun, speed, etc.);
  • Play an endless mode and remove the girls' clothes;

data.short_description: Plunderers Adventures: Sea of Whores is a micro tower defense in which you protect Annie's and Riley's pirate ship. Combine different spells, Beat a lot of monsters, and Upgrade the most famous pirate ship in the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Plunderers Adventures: Sea of Whores

content_descriptors.notes: Plunderers Adventures contains a nudity gallery that can be unlocked after you beat the game.
